name: Raft Survival Underwater World
description:
If you are sci-fi underwater searching for the massive treasure beneath it? Get ready for the battle against sea alien creatures. You play as a hero with amazing underwater skills where you try to find the unexplored sci-fi underwater plant, which lies there since very long. Only you will be able to find the sci-fi plants and survive underwater. Use all your fighting skills with an amazing strategy. Crush and smash everything in your path and become a hero. Would you be able to defeat these super-powered alien creatures in this game?

Main Features

• Easy to play.
• Alien creatures
• Multiple levels to play
• Smooth submarine controls
• Attractive graphics and sounds
• Realistic deep-sea 3D environment
• Ultimate underwater shooting experience
• Explore the alien environment collect items
